PRODUCTS

01. LA LAGARTIJA

Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your jurney! It will provide yot a rich delicious flavor.

ROASTING: 5/10
INTENSITY: 6/10

02. EL TIGRE

Really dark coffee, only for the real gourments. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with caramel.

ROASTING: 8/10
INTENSITY: 9/10

03. LA CUCARACHA

Sweet and intense with a big amount of different flavors. Caramel, grapes, strwaberry, you name it! It's great choice for warm summer days.

ROASTING: 3/10
INTENSITY: 7/10

Our coffees reflect us - young, wild and free.
We are on the journey of new tastes...
